name: EMIT DNIWER (REWIND TIME)
description:
You are the HERO of this game. After saving princess, you found out the horrific truth of this world...

This game will keep implementing new contents.

EXCITING NEW CONTENTS IN THE FUTURE

1, Princess

2, Level 2

3, Horrific Truth

Control:

Move with WASD

Jump with Space

P.S. Music by YAU
